extendedInfo.description: "Sword Hero" is an action game which a hero beat the monsters and complete the stages.-Stage-When you beat the monsters that you required to, you complete the mission of the stage and go to the next stage on the world map.-Battle-You use two ways of attacks in the battle.One way is to tap on monster and to throw the dagger.The other way is to use flick-input on display and to attack monsters by sword when lock-on mark is showing up on monster.Using sword can attack bunch of monsters by sliding your finger from side to side on display.-Item-You can make a higher rate of hit by using stronger weapon.Dagger: higher level one makes higher rate of hitSword: higher level one makes higher rate of hit-Ranking-This game has international and domestic ranking. Can you put your name on the leaderboard also?

reviews.title: Crappy game
reviews.comment: This game does blow I would not download this at all it probably is the worst games I\'ve play in a while
reviews.author: Quinn G

reviews.comment: WTF? This game blows more than the wind.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t even download!
reviews.comment: I can\'t experience thid game that looks pretty cool, cuz it wont download. I was away from the phone for at least 4 hours and I came back and it was still trying to install it! I have a pretty new phone it came out some time last year, its a sony ericsson.
reviews.author: A Google User
